text: “Ndiponso (adawatembenukira mwachifundo) aja atatu amene adawadikiritsa (pakusavomera msanga kulapa kwawo), kufikira pamene dziko lidawapana ngakhale lidali lophanuka, nabanika m’mitima mwawo natsimikiza kuti palibe komuthawira Allah (kwina) koma kwa Iye (Allah polapa). Kenako (Allah) adawatsogolera kulapa kuti alape. Ndithu Allah Ngolandira kulapa, Ngwachisoni chosatha
